Transcription for 1013706

Stone Place
The world is a world of light, of light of the universe.
Light of heaven, of heaven, of heaven,
The world is a world of light, of light of the universe.
Light of heaven, of heaven, of heaven,
The world is a world of light, of light of the universe.
Let the universe be light of all things,
Light of the universe, of everything things.
Light of heaven, of heaven, of heaven,
The world is a world of light, of light of the universe.
